title: RockBell
author: RockBell
content: Time management is just a way which one plans he or her self for the day like the popular saying that states that if you don’t plan then you planning to fail managing your time is very important in life as an individual is so interesting knowing what to do at a particular time, as for me I have to plan my day  as a radio presenter anchoring a lots of interesting programs on air actually amazing and a bitcoin lover  I came across tips that have helped me to be able to do my duties better and also doing a lots of interesting things online like doing research since crytocurrency is wide to be able to keep up with trading and so more , because no knowledge then your funds are at risk so I felt to share tips on managing our time it helps  because it enhances productivity and helps us work smarter, You being being busy does not  make you productive or effective .Advantages of time management-it give us a good reputation.-enhances productivity and makes us smarter.-create chances of advancement and improvement.-it reduces stress most importantly.Tools in managing your time-set goals what you plan to achieve in doing research/reading, have fun e.t.c-scheduling.-focus and concentration.-prioritization doing what is necessary at a particular time.Just feel like sharing this it will help us as newbies and also in our daily jobs

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Great mate nice work. But let me add this.Here is still Bitcoin talk forum and in as much as a good general advice is great but channeling you post more to the forum with explanations is best.Like for me personally coming up the ranks here in the forum time management has been key.# makes you meet up with post in time (the most interesting time to be part of a post conversation is early, you get to learn more then many times after that is filled up with spams)And if you are the busy type outside the forum you can still channel you time management in the forum according to your schedule, I like to be in the forum at the end of the day and having an alarm set for this has made me try to be online as often as I can, also the telegram notification can be of help to.
